item.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core api with Firebase
item.description: Introduction Update: Updated the code samples according to the changes introduced in .NET 2.0. Firebase is an application development framework and infrastructure provided by Google. It offers a handful of services, like Storage, Analytics, Notifications and Hosting, mainly targeted to mobile application developers. At first I was a bit confused by Firebase, since its functionality seems to overlap with Google’s generic cloud environment, the Google Cloud Platform, which has—among many other things—similar features.
